article_title: Breaking Bad Would Be Worse In A European Health Care System, Not Better

article_metadata.description: There's a slightly strange idea going around that if Breaking Bad were set in some European country, one with universal health care, then the major premise of the show simply would not exist. Which is a lovely thought it's just that it isn't true, certainly not of the health care [...]
article_metadata.author: Tim Worstall
